INFORMATION

You sleep like a top in these roomy, luxuriously-appointed, full-
length sleepers.
Arrive at your destination after a good night's
sleep, refreshed-ready for business or pleasure.
Ask your Travel Agent about the B.C.P.A. Service

properties.sfomuseum:description: Timetable issued by BCPA (British Commonwealth Pacific Airlines) for transpacific DC-6 sleeper service routes, effective April 25, 1953; fold-out format; blue, red, and white cover with text promoting service to Canada, USA, Hawaii, Fiji, Australia, and New Zealand.
